summary: Encapsulates the Level 1b X‑ray health service interface for tuberculosis screening, targeting children who cannot provide sputum samples. It evaluates X‑ray results and, when a positive finding is detected, triggers a referral workflow to initiate TB treatment.
business_intent: Enable rapid, non‑sputum based TB detection in pediatric patients and automate the referral process to start appropriate therapy, improving case detection and treatment initiation.
